column5: The home is exquisitely furnished, it has high ceilings, high quality furniture, complete kitchen, Pool and hot tub, views, and the location right on the lake. The home works for couples and families (with kids). It is on Lake Travis outside of Austin, boat dock also available. If there are 2 couples with children, it can accommodate 8 as each couch is a full single bed if you remove the pillows, even an adult can sleep there.
column8: Beautiful Waterfront Home on Lake Travis
